channel.title: Need help with when i log in
channel.description: hey im owner of a server and when i log in i want it to say woner and coder danny has loged in but how do i do that need some help please

item.source: Need help with when i log in

item.title: Need help with when i log in
item.dc:creator: @A.E.M A.E.M.
item.description:
@A.E.M wrote:

[quote=“dog eats dog, post:2, topic:146054”]optional Find a server that has what u are Requesting in this case

hey im owner of a server and when i log in i want it to say woner and coder danny has loged in but how do i do that need some help please

U request When u login it Appears that u have Here is how i think to do it Seniors members and Admins/Mods tell me if im wrong

1 - Look through Different servers on moparscape and w8 till the maker of the server logs on and if it tells every1 that they have logged on u have got the right one

2 - Try your hardest to find that servers source or ask the owner wat source is this based on and goto moparisthebest.com click downloads and search for that source and download it

3 - Look threw the source and on every thing thats in there click it the ones that are click-able and press Ctrl +f and type in the message that appeared on the server for example - “Server OWNER (name) HAS JUST LOGGED IN!!!” - and change it to - ( you name has just logged in )

4 - Copy and paste that bit into the same Notepad file as the one on the source u want it on ( both sources should have the same name )
Or easier use that source.

And this should of worked If u need more help or for me to dumb it down for u add me on shaneedwardgeorge@hotmail.com[/quote]

very amusing but read the post not the title

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with when i log in
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

optional Find a server that has what u are Requesting in this case

danny555:

hey im owner of a server and when i log in i want it to say woner and coder danny has loged in but how do i do that need some help please

U request When u login it Appears that u have Here is how i think to do it Seniors members and Admins/Mods tell me if im wrong

1 - Look through Different servers on moparscape and w8 till the maker of the server logs on and if it tells every1 that they have logged on u have got the right one

2 - Try your hardest to find that servers source or ask the owner wat source is this based on and goto moparisthebest.com click downloads and search for that source and download it

3 - Look threw the source and on every thing thats in there click it the ones that are click-able and press Ctrl +f and type in the message that appeared on the server for example - “Server OWNER (name) HAS JUST LOGGED IN!!!” - and change it to - ( you name has just logged in )

4 - Copy and paste that bit into the same Notepad file as the one on the source u want it on ( both sources should have the same name )
Or easier use that source.

And this should of worked If u need more help or for me to dumb it down for u add me on shaneedwardgeorge@hotmail.com

Read full topic
